title: PSA: Eletricity Bill Scam
selftext:
Hello folks.

Was targeted by a whole new type of scam today. Got a message from my landlord that the electricity is about to be cut soon. Of course that had me panicking and checking the payment status. Then I realized this might be a new scam.

I called the mobile number nonetheless for some much-needed entertainment. Scammer started off the call by exactly mentioning how much bill I had paid and when. Then went on to say that this bill did not get posted and therefore I would have to follow his instructions to post it. He asked me to open playstore and search quick support. Then results showed Team Viewer Quick Support.

​

At this point I could not hold it in any longer and asked what is he up to and how many people he had scammed today. This was followed by a colorful and expletive-ridden conversation by him. Sharing this great gentlemen's number here for your entertainment if you would like. 

8093812171

​

Red flags

* Mobile no. instead of helpline number
* Getting updates on WhatsApp from a nonbusiness account
* Lacking basic structure or punctuation
* Asking to download any further apps that grant access to your device

Stay safe people and please let people who might be vulnerable know of this new modus operandi. 

​

​

​

My friend received a whatsapp message that the electricity will be cut-off, from mobile number 6006859146 and was told to contact number 8971857545

I am mentioning numbers so someone else may not be scammed.
Yeah I got something along those lines as well. Blocked them immediately ofc
